creditline: Gift of Lucille and Arthur Weiss
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Standing Female Figure with diamond eyes, incised hair, flat earplugs with cross design, triple necklace. Slash fingers and toes. Burnished buff clay, traces of white. Left leg mended, right leg chipped below knee, ceramic, Mexican (Chupicuaro), 250BC - 300AD
title: Standing female figure
